import unittest
from unittest.mock import Mock, patch

class TestMockTokenAuthenticator(unittest.TestCase):
    
    mock_token = "mock_token"
    auth_endpoint = "https://auth.example.com"
    client_id = "my_client_id"
    client_secret = "my_client_secret"
    telemetry_client = Mock()

    @patch.object(requests.Session, "post")
    def test_get_auth_token(self, mock_post):
        # Arrange
        mock_response = Mock()
        mock_response.json.return_value = {"access_token": self.mock_token}
        mock_post.return_value = mock_response

        mock_token_authenticator = TokenAuthenticator(
            auth_endpoint=self.auth_endpoint,
            client_id=self.client_id,
            client_secret=self.client_secret,
            telemetry_client=self.telemetry_client
        )

        # Act
        mock_token = mock_token_authenticator.get_auth_token()

        # Assert
        self.assertIsNotNone(mock_token)
        self.assertEqual(type(mock_token), str)

        # Check the format of the mock token.
        self.assertEqual(len(mock_token), len(self.mock_token))
